"""
 Sample script which charges for resilient setups on public computers.
 """
 if context.getSlapState() not in ["start_requested", "stop_requested"]: 
 return 1
 
 # the "resilient" and "kvm-resilient" should come from Product Individual Variation,
 # of the sofware product.
 # XXX Hardcoded
 if context.getSourceReference() not in ["resilient", "kvm-resilient"]:
 return 1
 
 free = 1
 # We don't charge for unpublished SR.
 software_release_url = context.getUrlString()
 software_release = context.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 url_string=software_release_url, 
 validation_state="published")
 
 if software_release is not None:
 software_product = software_release.getAggregateValue()
 if software_product.getValidationState() == "published":
 free = 0
 
 if free:
 return 0
 
 # Only charge if HS is hosted in public servers.
 software_instance_list = context.getSpecialiseRelatedValueList(portal_type="Software Instance")
 for software_instance in software_instance_list:
 computer_partition = software_instance.getAggregateValue()
 if computer_partition is not None and computer_partition.getAllocationScope() == "open/public":
 return 0
 
 return 1
